questions.question: Some pointy-eared aliens made First Contact with Earth in this Sci Fi universe.
Thanks to changes in editing, a famous debate in Star Wars is whether Han shot first, or this character.
This minor character is seen throughout the Futurama series, but the rest of the Planet Express crew rarely remember who he is.
This is the name of Morpheus' ship in The Matrix.
This Cylon model, one of the 13 Humanoids, had his entire line murdered before the series began.
